verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The father knows the destiny of each heart
He knows the paths to choose for His flock
To all those who sacrifice all to obey His voice
Will be found in the place sanctioned by the Lords divine choice
Let the Lord carry you
O Let the Lord carry you
On the wings of His Spirit
Up into the heavenlies
Rising unto perfect peace
High above life's storms
Gods grace is a strong tie
that binds you to His side
N matter what your next steps may unfold
So sons be victorious
And as you go on in Him
